translation: I will declare to you in full this knowledge combined with realization, after knowing which nothing else remains to be known here.
commentary: 7.2 Knowledge indirect knowledge of Sastras? They to thee? I'm I? Savijnanam combined with realization (direct knowledge of the Atman through experience)? This is this? I will tell you will declare? Infinitely in full? that which? knowing having known? Not not? Ih here? More more? Anything else? Know what ought to be known? remains remains.Commentary Jnanam is Paroksha Jnanam or indirect knowledge of
